Package refactor.protocol.xbot

Class XBotNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • refactor.protocol.AbstractMessageListener
      • refactor.protocol.xbot.XBotNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessageListener, Node
    public class XBotNode
extends AbstractMessageListener
implements Node
    To know more about the XBot protocol, read http://asc.di.fct.unl.pt/~jleitao/pdf/srds09-leitao.pdf

    27.06.2019

    • Field Detail

      • activeView

        private RandomList<java.net.InetSocketAddress> activeView
        This active view stores Nodes with which the local Node communicates directly, in the scope of the overlaying application. In other words, the application can only send content Messages with Nodes in the active view.

      • passiveView

        private RandomList<java.net.InetSocketAddress> passiveView
        This passive view stores Nodes with which the local Node communicates only through control Messages. For example, it's in the passive peers that the local Node tries to find candidates for optimizations, and to ensure network overlay connectivity

      • currentRounds

        private XBotRoundPool currentRounds

      • oracle

        private AsyncOracle oracle
